biography: Randall Carver was born on May 25, 1946 in Fort Worth, Texas, USA. He is an actor, known for There Will Be Blood (2007), Taxi (1978) and Time to Run (1973). He has been married to Shelley Herman since December 21, 2012.
name: Randall Carver
